recipe.title: Pork Chops with Apples
recipe.description: Pan-seared pork chops with caramelized apples and sage

steps.descr: Season pork chops generously with salt and pepper
steps.instructions: Season pork chops generously with salt and pepper

on_enter.say: Right, let's season those lovely pork chops generously with salt and pepper. Make sure they're well coated for maximum flavour!

steps.descr: Pan-fry chops 4-5 minutes per side, set aside
steps.instructions: Pan-fry chops 4-5 minutes per side, set aside

on_enter.say: Now, let's get those chops into a hot pan. We're going to fry them for four to five minutes on each side until they're beautifully golden. You'll hear them sizzle away!

steps.descr: In same pan, add butter and apple slices
steps.instructions: In same pan, add butter and apple slices

on_enter.say: Brilliant! Now, in the same pan, let's add the butter and those lovely apple slices. They'll start to soften and smell amazing.
Let's cook those apples until they're beautifully caramelized. They'll turn a lovely golden brown and smell sweet and delicious.

steps.descr: Add sage, cider, and honey, simmer
steps.instructions: Add sage, cider, and honey, simmer

on_enter.say: Now, let's add the fresh sage leaves, apple cider, and a tablespoon of honey. Give it a good stir and let it simmer gently. The aroma will be fantastic!

steps.descr: Return chops to pan, coat with sauce
steps.instructions: Return chops to pan, coat with sauce

on_enter.say: Right, let's return those chops to the pan and coat them with that gorgeous sauce. They'll soak up all those lovely flavours.
Time to plate up! Serve those beautiful pork chops with some creamy mashed potatoes. Enjoy your meal!

notes.text:
Don't overcook pork - it should be slightly pink
Let chops rest before serving
Granny Smith apples work wonderfully
